mechanic.description: We'll introduce the queue. If it overflows, it's game over!

steps.title: Introducing the Queue
steps.text: As tickets come in, the dispatcher must get them to technicians. If you get too behind, it'll spell trouble!

mechanic.description: We'll introduce the color code. The right ticket needs to get to the right tech.

steps.title: Color-Coding Tickets
steps.text: If Shermie has a color, make sure that ticket goes to the right person. It's all about the right match!

mechanic.description: We'll introduce Gates. Sometimes a tech is out of office and you can't get a ticket to them.

steps.title: Gates Are Closed
steps.text: Sometimes a tech is out of the office! That means you can’t send tickets to them. Make sure you're aware of who’s available.

mechanic.description: We'll introduce Bomb Shermie. Some tickets are time-critical – take care of them fast!

steps.title: Bomb Shermie
steps.text: Some tickets are critical! If you don’t assign them quickly, it’s game over!

mechanic.description: We'll introduce Toxic Shermie. Some tickets need to be waited on and put back into the queue.

steps.title: Toxic Shermie
steps.text: Some tickets need to be put back into the queue. These tickets cannot be handled immediately – wait your turn!

mechanic.description: We'll introduce Powerup 1: Invulnerability. Some tickets are much simpler once you use the powerup!

steps.title: Invulnerability Powerup
steps.text: Some tickets look harder than they are. Use the invulnerability powerup to complete them faster!

mechanic.description: We'll introduce Powerup 2. This powerup is super helpful, and you'll need it!

steps.title: Powerup 2
steps.text: Powerup 2 is going to make your life easier. Use it wisely and keep the queue under control.
